text: The Grafting of Life (Persian: Peyvande zendegi) is a 1953 Iranian film directed by Ebrahim Moradi.Issari p.274 ==Cast== * Abdullah Basirat * Reza Mirfattah * Ebrahim Moradi == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. Scarecrow Press, 1989. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:Iranian films Category:Persian-language films Category:Films directed by Ebrahim Moradi
title: The Grafting of Life
